member.name: T:VBMaze.VBGame.Assets
member.summary: A suggested way to organise assets.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Images.save(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.String,System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat)
member.summary: Saves image to a file
member.param: Default is png format.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Images.sliceSpriteSheet(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Size,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Seperates images from a larger image. Operates from left to right, then moving down.
member.param: Image of spritesheet.
Amount of images in the width and height.
How many images from the sheet should be sliced.
To reverse the individual images after slicing.

member.name: T:VBMaze.VBGame.Images
member.summary: Contains image related functions, e.g. save, load, rotate...

member.name: T:VBMaze.VBGame.Collisions
member.summary: Contains all of the functions for colliding shapes.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.update
member.summary: Renders the display buffer to the form.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.getRect(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the display area as a rectangle.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.blit(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Draws an image to the screen (scaled).

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.blit(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Draws an image to the screen (unscaled).

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.blitCentered(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Blits an unscaled image centering on the point.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.DrawBase.blitCentered(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Blits an unscaled image centering on the rectangle.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Display.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Form@,System.Drawing.Size,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Configures VBGame for operation. Must be called before starting game loop.
member.param: Form that will be drawn on.
Width and height of display area, in pixels.
String that will be displayed on title bar.
Enabling this will turn off pixel smoothing. Good for pixel art.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Display.clockTick(System.Double)
member.summary: Waits so that the specified fps can be achieved.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Display.getTime
member.summary: Gets the time in milliseconds since the last clockTick()

member.name: T:VBMaze.VBGame.Display
member.summary: Game loop must be in a thread.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Surface.#ctor(System.Drawing.Rectangle,VBMaze.VBGame.Display)
member.param: Display to draw on.

member.name: T:VBMaze.VBGame.Surface
member.summary: Gets a portion of the display given to do drawing operations on. Anything drawn outside of the bounds of the surface will not be drawn on the parent display. Surfaces are static.

member.name: P:VBMaze.VBGame.Sound.volume
member.summary: Changing this will update the volume.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Sound.play(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: If enabled, the sound will loop. Note: this does not work with .wav files.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Animation.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Size,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Image of spritesheet.
Amount of images in the width and height.
How many images from the sheet should be sliced.
To reverse the individual images after slicing.
If enabled, the animation will loop.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Animation.getFramesFromStrip(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Size,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: See VBGame.sliceSpriteSheet()

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Animation.handle
member.summary: Used in conjection with VBGame.blit(), this will pick the image to return based on a timer.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Animation.getFrame(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the next frame.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Animations.handle
member.summary: Returns a frame from the active animation.

member.name: P:VBMaze.VBGame.Sprite.xc
member.summary: How much the x value of the sprite should move when move() is called.

member.name: P:VBMaze.VBGame.Sprite.yc
member.summary: How much the y value of the sprite should move when move() is called.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Sprite.normalizeAngle
member.summary: Ensures the sprite's angle is between 0 and 360 degrees.

member.name: M:VBMaze.VBGame.Sprite.keepInBounds(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Keeps the sprite in a rectangle.
member.param: Rectangle container.
Whether or not the sprite is using angled movement.
If enabled, the sprite will change it's movement to give the appearence of bouncing.
